ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Bards abilities redefined was: Attack speedups
ygData.msgSnippet: Overcrowding is not something that can be controlled by a class of characters :p  And on overcrowded servers a group with a Bard will still make better
ygData.messageBody:
Overcrowding is not something that can be controlled by a class of
characters :p And on overcrowded servers a group with a Bard will still
make better experience as they are ready to pull another mob sooner then the
group with out a bard.

Rokenn

PS Not every server is overcrowded, and in some cases it is more an issue of
zone overcrowding then overall server overcrowding.

-----Original Message-----
From: Webber, Jessica [mailto:webber@...]
Sent: Thursday, March 30, 2000 10:00 AM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Bards abilities redefined was: Attack speedups


Rokenn wrote:

> No one, and I mean no one, is better at down time reduction
> then we are. Ask
> any player in, on any server, what they hate the most about
> the game and I
> would bet a FBSS and a pair of yaks that downtime would be at
> the top of the
> list.

I'll see your FBSS and yaks and raise you a HQ Bear Skin that overcrowding
would beat downtime. And less people per server would help all classes.
Just about anyone would be welcome in a group were the ratio of mobs/players
better.

Peace
Evulia, bard of 10 verses, Tunare
